alert.note: Alert for Carbon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 7:10PM MDT until July 28 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Carbon County in south central Montana... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 709 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Absarokee, or 14 miles north of Red Lodge, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Cooney Reservoir State Park, Edgar, Rockvale, Boyd, and Roberts. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
